isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - CAB - TILT: 9800 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - SUN SHADE

svcsubproc.title: Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for Items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. PAN HEAD SCREW, 1/4-20 UNC X 1, FLAT WASHER AND SPECIAL NUT, 1/4-20 UNC
3. PAN HEAD SCREW, 5/16-18 UNC X 1, FLAT WASHER, LOCKWASHER AND HEX NUT, 5/16 UNC
5. PAN HEAD SCREW, 1/4-20 UNC X 3/4, LOCKWASHER AND HEX NUT 1/4-20 UNC

step1.para: Remove 8 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1) securing sun shade (Item 2) to cab roof, 3 each at right and left end and 2 each in center of sun shade.
Remove 4 pan head screws, flat washers, lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 3) securing sun shade (Item 2) to sun shade brackets (Item 4). Remove sun shade.
Remove 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 5) securing sun shade brackets (Item 4) to cab roof. Remove sun shade brackets and sun shade bracket roof reinforcements (Item 6).

svcsubproc.title: Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 64 for Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position sun shade bracket roof reinforcements (Item 6) and sun shade brackets (Item 4) in place on cab roof. Install 4 pan head screws and lockwashers (Item 5) securing sun shade brackets to cab roof.

Position sun shade (Item 2) in place on cab roof and sun shade brackets (Item 4). Install 4 pan head screws, flat washers, lockwashers and hex nuts (Item 3) securing sun shade to sun shade brackets. Do not tighten.

Align sun shade (Item 2) with mounting holes in cab roof, 3 each at right and left end and 2 each in the center of sun shade. Install 8 pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1) securing sun shade to cab roof.
